faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
appointment.title: Book Appointment
home.hero.title: Welcome to DHB Davilas Hair & Beauty
home.hero.subtitle: Experience the best hair care and styling services
general.title: General
general.question.services: What types of hair services do you offer?
general.answer.services: We offer haircuts for women, men, and children, coloring, highlights, weaves, hair treatments, event hairstyles, and more.
general.question.appointment: Do I need to book an appointment in advance?
general.answer.appointment: Yes, it is recommended to book an appointment to secure a spot, but walk-ins are also accepted depending on availability.
quality.title: Quality & Satisfaction
quality.question.quality: How do you guarantee the quality of your services?
quality.answer.quality: We use professional products and work with qualified hairstylists. Each service is adapted to your hair type.
quality.question.unsatisfied: What if I am not satisfied with the result?
quality.answer.unsatisfied: Your satisfaction is our priority. Please let us know and we will do what is necessary to correct or adjust the service.
services.title: Our Services
services.question.damagedHair: Do you offer treatments for damaged or dry hair?
services.answer.damagedHair: Yes, we provide specific treatments such as hydration, hair botox, keratin, and repairing oils.
services.question.events: Do you do hairstyles for weddings or special events?
services.answer.events: Absolutely! We create hairstyles for weddings, parties, photoshoots, and all kinds of events.
services.question.advice: Do you offer personalized hair advice?
services.answer.advice: Yes, our hairstylists can recommend haircuts and treatments based on your hair texture and style.
payment.title: Payment
payment.question.methods: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer.methods: We accept card payments, bank transfers, cash, and sometimes online payment options depending on the branch.
payment.question.packages: Do you offer packages or subscriptions?
payment.answer.packages: Yes, we offer haircut + treatment packages as well as loyalty cards for discounts.

hero.title: Welcome to DHB Davilas Hair & Beauty
hero.subtitle: Where Beauty Meets Artistry
about.title: About Us
about.description: At DHB Davilas Hair & Beauty, we are dedicated to providing high-quality hair care and styling services for both men and women...
mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To be the leading hair salon that inspires confidence and self-expression through expert hair care, creativity, and innovation.
vision.title: Our Vision
vision.point1: To provide exceptional hair services in a comfortable and welcoming environment.
vision.point2: To stay updated with the latest trends and techniques.
vision.point3: To use high-quality products that nourish and protect all hair types.
vision.point4: To build strong relationships with our clients through personalized care.
vision.cta: At DHB Davilas Hair & Beauty, your satisfaction is our priority. Book an appointment today and let us transform your hair with expertise and passion!
why.title: Why Choose Us
why.subtitle: Experience Luxury Hair Care
services.stylist.title: Professional Stylists
services.stylist.text: Our expert hairstylists bring years of experience to craft the perfect look for you.
services.products.title: Premium Hair Products
services.products.text: We use top-quality, salon-grade products to keep your hair healthy and vibrant.
services.styles.title: Trendy & Classic Styles
services.styles.text: Stay ahead of the trends or embrace timeless elegance with our diverse styling options.
services.experience.title: Relaxing Salon Experience
services.experience.text: Enjoy a calming atmosphere with personalized care that makes every visit special.
